adDetails: It's not so difficult! I am a professional french teacher from France and one to teach you informal french conversation---with my help, you will be more connected to the "natives" on your next trip to France. Understanding, speaking, writing! I can also help you translate from English to French if you need to write letters or common documents in French. More information gladly given. Contact me at show contact info or by e-mail. Mylaine, San FRANCISCO, Russian Hill.
